price: Kwani hukuona jinsi Mola wako Mlezi alivyo watenda wale wenye tembo?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
footnotes: Hakika, ewe Muhammad, unajua kwa ujuzi usio ingiliwa na shaka yoyote, alivyo fanya Mola wako Mlezi kuwafanyia wale watu wenye tembo (ndovu), wakataka kuishambulia Nyumba takatifu ya Al-Kaaba.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
